item.description: ZundaGPT2 Lite ZundaGPT2 Lite is a lightweight chat client application that lets you interact with AI using APIs provided by OpenAI, Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, and others. While there is a full-featured sister app, ZundaGPT2, this Lite version is streamlined by removing the voice output ...
